*NEW* Papi Commando Tennis Demo BEX - Megadrive


This is the new Demo of Papi Tennis !

Coded with BasiEgaXorz by Joseph Norman.

You can play with a Friend or against AI for training of a 1 set Match !!

This Demo will be done with the futur new Studio Vetea Game published by Côté Gamers, Bomb on Basic City SE !!

Controls :

PAD : Move Papi.

Button A : Normal Shoot !

UP & Button A : Long Shoot.

DOWN & Button A : Short Shoot.

Button A & Button B : Power Shoot.

Button START : Pause Game.

============================================

* Graphics,Sound & Code by Vetea.

* Music by Kaot.

* Powered with Bex & 68K ASM.

Have fun ! :D

Vetea


Published	Mar 17, 2018
Status	Prototype
Platforms	Windows, macOS, Linux, Android
Author	Studio Vetea
Genre	Sports

https://vetea.itch.io/papi-commando-tennis-bex-demo
